amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a perfecting amendment to the Weldon (FL) amendment to increase funds authorized for the NASA personnel account by $81.5 million and reduce the NASA Space Science and Travel accounts by $73 million.

action.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Sensenbrenner to the Weldon (FL) amendment (A011).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
